metadata.subject: Bloomberg article about Trump and Iran

notable_quotes: The information contained in this communication is confidential, may be attorney-client privileged, may constitute inside information

analysis.summary: An email from 'J' to Reid Weingarten forwarding a Bloomberg news article about international agreement with Trump's position on Iran, with a brief 'please note' instruction and extensive confidentiality disclaimers.
